HYP3RIDS

If you are interested in our own contemporary hybrids, please check out our ‘Hyp3rids’ gallery on the main menu. We take great pride in our breeding work and make a point of not releasing official Hyp3rids strains until they are fully tested.

Future releases tend to come from selections of our ‘Collections’ projects, but now and again we like to surprise our friends with something out of the blue. Either way, we document our journey and invite you along for the ride. 

Please follow us on Instagram to keep up to date.  

HEIRLOOM IBL

In ‘Heirloom IBL’ you will find rare, classic and previously unreleased ‘Inbred’ lines from around the world. These include modern landrace collections and heirloom varieties to more obscure cultivars. Our aim is to re-introduce these rare gene pools back into the public domain as both re-worked lines and crosses.

Full details of each strain will be made available, and you’ll be able to see full progress of each collection on our Instagram feed. For us, unearthing and exploring potential new strains is at the forefront of our drive.

COLLECTIONS

And finally, our ‘Collection’ gallery features our male selections, and a multitude of pollenated offspring. These include our own hybrids and other ‘breeder’ strains we enjoy working with. Nothing makes us more happy than diving into our seed vault to find potential partners for these males. And we like it even more when we see these ventures pay off. 

Important note… we never EVER use breeder ‘clones’. All our ladies are selected by us, with plant quality and effect our main focus.

FUTURE DEVELOPMENT & ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS

You can see all of our work as it happens on our Instagram feed. We like including our followers in our growing adventures so you can all observe our progress first hand. We feel this clearly defines our ‘no bullshit‘ stance on breeding, and we pride ourselves on our openness.

Our work would not exist if it wasn’t for the hard work and perseverance of other likeminded people. We ALWAYS give credit and recognition to other peoples work, especially when  it’s used in our own. This simple gesture has built some amazing relationships, consistently improving our own horticultural knowledge, while widening our incredible genetic pool.

OUR SERVICES

WE SELL ‘HEMP’ SEEDS… NOTHING ELSE!

 

WE DO NOT SELL CLONES, TISSUE CULTURE OR ANY KIND OF PLANT MATERIAL.

WE DO NOT SELL CANNABIS FLOWER (BUDS), HASH OR CONCERNTRATE, SO PLEASE DON’T ASK.

 

We DO NOT offer any kind of germination / growing information as our seeds are intended for souvenir purposes only. None of our seeds contain THC (tetrahydrocannabinol), and germination in most countries is illegal without an agricultural license. Hyp3rids does not encourage anyone to break the law in their country. For more on legality issues hit the ‘Full Disclaimer’ button to the right. Still have questions? Don’t hesitate to get in contact.

 

TEAM HYP3RIDS IS BASED IN THE EUROPE UNION

CERTIFIED LINKS

Would you like to stock our genetics? If yes, we want to hear from you. Hit the ‘mail’ icon at the top right of the main menu and send us your requests.
